channel.title: Steam servers down?
channel.description: Is it only me, or are the steam servers down atm? Steam client cannot connect either..

item.title: Steam servers down?
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
striker:

Just that the stats page also doesn’t work when all the servers are down.

very rarely are the crashes that bad. 90% of the time I go straight there to check and it’s in perfect working order.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam servers down?
item.dc:creator: unix87
item.description:
striker:

Just that the stats page also doesn’t work when all the servers are down.
<…>
Thx, but if you don’t read that beforehand, you still don’t know what’s going on.

You can use the RSS Feed. Or subscribe to the thread to be emailed. In addition, you could use some filter to automatically move the emails to some folder (or add a label) to separate them from the rest and mark them as read.

… or what if there was a group on steam where announcements were made every time there is info available about upcoming downtime. Just need to find someone dedicated enough.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam servers down?
item.dc:creator: striker
item.description:
Siggs:

next time use the steam stats page instead of posting a useless thread…

Just that the stats page also doesn’t work when all the servers are down.

M. Rhoten:

We’ll be updating some of the Steam servers Tuesday March 13th, 2012 around 16:00 PDT (we’re on summer time now, so that’s 23:00 GMT). Chat, game lobbies, and the community web site will be affected for the duration of the maintenance. Some content downloads may be briefly interrupted. Game play should generally not be interrupted but may be impacted for some multi-player titles.

SURPLUS_NiNjA:

https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=784745

You might want this thread for future reference.

Thx, but if you don’t read that beforehand, you still don’t know what’s going on.

Read full topic
